page.title: 08Religion
page.content: The Parish Church of St Mary the Virgin, Church of England, Priest in Charge is Reverend Robert Grist. Churchwardens Mr Peter Werran and Mr Roger Tucker. Holy Communion every Sunday, Mattins once a month average attendance at 10 am, 30 worshippers. At major festivals 10% of the population attends, the Church seats 180, and a Sunday School with 14 pupils on the roll. West Down Evangelical Church, Trustee in Charge, Mr Joe Coren, started in 1839. Church extended 3 times, in 1925, 1978 and 1983. Seats 100, average attendance 50 to 60 on Sunday afternoons, 20 at Morning Communion. There is a Methodist Church at Cheriton Cross with Reverend Barbara Facey in charge. By Mrs N Grist
